sources.title: The Girl in 419
sources.description: Title: The Girl in 419 Summary: When a young woman is found lying in the street, savagely beaten and near daeth, she's taken to a big city hospital where two young doctors try to save her life. As she recovers, she ... Directed by: Alexander Hall, George Somnes Actors: Production Company: Paramount Pictures Release Date: 26 May 1933 (USA) Aspect Ratio: 1.37 : 1 When a young woman is found lying in the street, savagely beaten and near daeth, she's taken to a big city hospital where two young doctors try to save her life. As she recovers, she refuses to talk about it, as she fears the gangster who was responsible will come after her again. Unknown to all is the fact that the gangster's chief henchman is in the hospital with orders to finish the job.

metadata.Plot: A young woman is found in the street, savagely beaten and near death. As she recovers in hospital, the chief henchman of the gangster responsible is in the hospital with orders to finish the job.
metadata.Writer: Allen Rivkin, Manuel Seff, P.J. Wolfson
metadata.Actors: James Dunn, Gloria Stuart, David Manners
